state_description: Initial state after navigation: how can i create a database in notion
llm_enhanced_instruction: In your web browser, go to https://www.notion.so to open Notion, which you’ll use to create your database.
llm_context: The Notion homepage appears with the Notion logo at the top left and 'Log in' and 'Try Notion free' buttons at the top right, indicating you’re ready to sign in and you’re one step closer to creating your database.
